Job Title: Client Experience Specialist

Location: Columbus, Ohio Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Customer Service, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Job Title: Client Experience SpecialistLocation: Surge Staffing HeadquartersPosition Type: Full-time – On-Site
About Surge Staffing:Surge Staffing is a leading staffing agency committed to providing exceptional workforce solutions to our clients across various industries. With a focus on quality service and unparalleled client satisfaction, Surge Staffing prides itself on delivering top-notch staffing solutions tailored to the unique needs of each client.
Job Description:As a Client Experience Specialist at Surge Staffing Headquarters, you will play a pivotal role in managing and enhancing the client experience for our esteemed clients. Your primary responsibility will be to oversee and nurture existing client accounts, ensuring utmost satisfaction with our staffing services. Additionally, you will be tasked with sourcing and prospecting for new clients to expand our clientele base.
Responsibilities:and maintain relationships with existing client accounts to ensure high satisfaction levels and repeat business.as the primary point of contact for clients, addressing their inquiries, concerns, and service requests promptly and professionally.regular check-ins and follow-ups with clients to assess their staffing needs and gather feedback on our services.with internal teams to ensure timely and efficient delivery of staffing solutions that meet client expectations.identify opportunities to upsell additional services or solutions to existing clients to drive revenue growth.various channels for client outreach, including phone calls, emails, and in-person meetings, to nurture relationships and foster trust.market research and prospecting activities to identify and engage potential new clients in target industries or markets.closely with the sales team to develop tailored proposals and presentations for prospective clients, showcasing our capabilities and value proposition.updated on industry trends, market dynamics, and competitor activities to inform strategic decision-making and enhance our competitive advantage.
Qualifications:degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).experience in a client-facing role, preferably in customer service, account management, or sales.communication and interpersonal skills, with a passion for delivering excellent customer service.organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple client accounts simultaneously.and results-oriented, with a proactive mindset and a drive to exceed targets and objectives.to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt quickly to changing priorities and client needs.in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software (e.g., Salesforce) for tracking client interactions and managing accounts.
Why Join Surge Staffing:At Surge Staffing, we offer a dynamic and supportive work environment where your contributions are valued, and your career growth is encouraged. As a Client Experience Specialist, you will have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact on our clients' businesses while honing your skills and expertise in client management and sales. Join us in our mission to deliver exceptional staffing solutions and build lasting partnerships with our clients.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
